group_1.narration: Finally, I was referred to a film expert…

group_1.textLeft: If it's movies you're wanting to know about,@I know just who to ask.
There's a girl in the History Club who's a film@aficionado.
I'm sure you can learn something from her!

group_1.textRight: Still, why would someone in a History Club…@know all about movies?
So…you wanna learn about movies, huh?
First things first, why do you want@to study film?

group_1.textLeft: As I've been told, you want to make your@partner Chisato go "I can't believe this?"

group_1.textCenter: That's… Felicia told you that, didn't she?
I'm always being dragged around by Chisato,@and I'm never prepared for what she brings.
Just once…I want to be the one to surprise her@instead!

group_1.textRight: …And to that end, you've been focusing all your@time on practicing cooking and portraiture.
Chisato… I take it she enjoys movies, then?

group_1.textLeft: Right, she's taken me to the movies@more times than I can count.
She would be staggered if I knew more about@movies than her for once.

group_1.textRight: I see… Hmm…@That would be difficult.
Getting better at cooking and portrait drawing,@that's a goal that's easy to understand.
But when it comes to movies…

group_1.textLeft: …Let's say I want to study them…@Or something like that.

group_1.textRight: It might be doable if all you want to know@is the basics.
But if you want to learn the deeper and@more complicated stuff...
Things like film structure and shot composition@and all that...
You can only really understand it by actually@watching movies.
It's not something you can learn overnight…
Perhaps you could make your own movie@instead?

group_1.textLeft: Make my own…?!@That's a lot of work.

group_1.textRight: Actually, it might not be, especially since@you've got me here.
Speaking of which, what sorts of movies@does your partner enjoy most?

group_1.textLeft: But I'd say we have a good number of action@movies at home…

group_1.textRight: Action, huh… Darn…@That's pretty hard to swing together…

group_1.textLeft: It'd have to be a movie a beginner could@quickly shoot…

group_1.textRight: If it's too much to make a movie yourself…
Perhaps you could learn about film production@by sampling videos together?
For those who love movies,
the ability to make your own motion pictures@might be appealing.

group_1.textLeft: Good idea.@What sort of video would work, then?

group_1.textRight: Takina, this is something you plan to present@to Chisato, yes?
Have you determined how you'll be showing@her all this?
In that case, you can host a video debut party…
It'll be your "Opening Night."
That would definitely add some pizzazz@to the whole reveal!
Yes, that could be great.@What do you think, Takina?
I'll give you my full support for the technical@stuff!
So let's down to business.@What kind of design would you like?

group_1.textLeft: There's one thing I'd like to try.
